page.description: Transfers a file using FTP. The FTP_FILE_XFER() function is a lower-level function that is wrapped by FTP_GET_FILE()and FTP_PUT_FILE().
page.prototype: C ftp_file_xfer(C address, C user, C password, C source_file, C destination_file, C GetPut [, L background [, C title]])

argument.name: address
argument.description: The FTP address of the transmission.

description.p: Specifies the operating mode. Can be one of the following:

item.name: get
item.description: The specified file is downloaded from the server to the local system.

item.name: put
item.description: The specified file is uploaded to the server from the local system.

argument.name: background
argument.description: Default = .T. If .T., the displayed dialog is modeless. If .F., the dialog is modal, and the script pauses until the FTP transfer is complete.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Default = "FTP Transfer". The title of the dialog box.
